amendment.description: To require a study by the Government Accountability Office on the efficacy of strategies used by the Federal Aviation Administration and the Department of Transportation to address flight delays at airports in the United States.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2829 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2829 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Menendez. (consideration: CR S11404-11405; text: CR S11404) To require a study by the Government Accountability Office on the efficacy of strategies used by the Federal Aviation Administration and the Department of Transportation to address flight delays at airports in the United States.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2829 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Menendez.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2829 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
